LIKE_GREET: We like to meet with you!
DEFESIVE_PACT: Join your drones with ours to defend!
BORDER_WARS: We have detected %1$s! We will kill all your kind!
ASK_PROTECTION: We pay for safety of our fleet for 5 star years, how you answer?
ASK_MOVE_FLEET: We have noticed your fleet %1$s in our sector! Move it away immediately!
OFFER_SPY_TRADE: Join your spies with our spies for 20 star years?
MAKE_WAR: We will kill all your kind!%1$s
OFFER_ACCEPTED: We are happy to make trade with you!
TRADE_EMBARGO: We should turn our backs for 20 star years against %1$s.
DECLINE_WAR: We offer you this and you accept it?%1$s
ACKNOWLEDGE_WAR: We accept your war offer and kill all your kinds!
NOTHING_TO_TRADE: We found out that you had nothing we want.
FRIENDS_GREET: Our friend! We are ready to talk with you!
OFFER_REJECTED: We are waiting your counter offer...
DEMAND: We demand you to accept this!
HATE_GREET: We hate meetings with you but let's see your offer!
INSULT_RESPOND: You are acting like a larvae!
ASK_MOVE_SPY: We have noticed your spy fleet %1$s in our sector! Move it away immediately!
